name: miniapp-template
description: Comprehensive template for AI-generated mini-apps with data orchestration patterns

scripts.dev: npm run build:frontend:dev && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --kill-others "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:mock-api"
scripts.dev:watch: npm run build:frontend && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --kill-others "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:mock-api" "npm run dev:frontend-watch"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:frontend && npm run typecheck:backend
